34 enum class PhysicsActorFlag {
35  kVisualization = physx::PxActorFlag::eVISUALIZATION, // Enable debug renderer for this actor
36  kDisableGravity = physx::PxActorFlag::eDISABLE_GRAVITY, // Disable gravity for this actor
37  kSendSleepNotifies = physx::PxActorFlag::eSEND_SLEEP_NOTIFIES, // Enables the sending of PxSimulationEventCallback::onWake() and PxSimulationEventCallback::onSleep() notify events.
38  kDisableSimulation = physx::PxActorFlag::eDISABLE_SIMULATION // Dosab;es simulation for the actor, only supported by PxRigidStatic and PxRigidDynamic
39 };
40 MAKE_BITWISE(PhysicsActorFlag);
41 MAKE_FLAGS_EXT(PhysicsActorFlag, PhysicsActorFlags, physx::PxU8)

72 
74  ActorType getType() const { return m_actorType; }
75 
77  physx::PxActor* actor() { return m_actor; }
78 
80 
81  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
84 
86  template<typename T>
87  T* as() const {
88  static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<physx::PxActor, T>, "Class must be a subclass of physx::PxActor");
89  return m_actor->is<T>();
90  }
91 
92  void enableGravity();
93  void disableGravity();
94

100 
102  QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;

106

113  const char* className() const override { return "PhysicsActor"; }

116  const char* namespaceName() const override { return "rev::PhysicsActor"; }
117 
119

121 
122  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
125 
126 
128  inline SceneObject* sceneObject() const {
129  if (!m_actor) {
130  return nullptr;
131  }
132  else {
133  return (SceneObject*)m_actor->userData;
134  }
135  }

153 // TODO: Store these instead of m_isKinematic, or even better, don't store flags here at all, just access them
154 enum class RigidBodyFlag {
155  kKinematic = physx::PxRigidBodyFlag::eKINEMATIC,
156  kUseKinematicTargetForSceneQueries = physx::PxRigidBodyFlag::eUSE_KINEMATIC_TARGET_FOR_SCENE_QUERIES,
157  kEnableCCD = physx::PxRigidBodyFlag::eENABLE_CCD, // Enables swept integration for the actor
158  kEnableCCDFriction = physx::PxRigidBodyFlag::eENABLE_CCD_FRICTION, // Enable friction in swept integration
159  kEnablePoseIntegrationPReview = physx::PxRigidBodyFlag::eENABLE_POSE_INTEGRATION_PREVIEW,
160  kEnableSpeculativeCCD = physx::PxRigidBodyFlag::eENABLE_SPECULATIVE_CCD,
161  kEnableCCDMaxContactImpulse = physx::PxRigidBodyFlag::eENABLE_CCD_MAX_CONTACT_IMPULSE,
162  kRetainAccelerations = physx::PxRigidBodyFlag::eRETAIN_ACCELERATIONS
163 };
164 MAKE_BITWISE(RigidBodyFlag);
165 MAKE_FLAGS_EXT(RigidBodyFlag, RigidBodyFlags, physx::PxU8)
